Pre-Game Insights: The Faroe Islands enjoyed a positive Nations League campaign in 2022 but have struggled since, suffering a 1-0 defeat to Latvia in the third-place clash of the 2024 Baltic Cup.
North Macedonia has endured a difficult run of results, being beaten 2-1 by the Czech Republic last time out.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Saturday's game will mark just the second meeting between the Faroe Islands and North Macedonia.
The hosts have managed just two clean sheets in their last 22 games across all competitions.
The Lions were ranked 72nd in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 66 places above their weekend opponents.
Others: The Faroe Islands are on a three-game losing streak and have won just one of their last 16 games across all competitions.
North Macedonia have also lost their last three games on the bounce and are winless in their last six.
